About.text: Passionate web developer with experience in creating open source tools and web solutions. Committed to constantly learning and growing in this exciting field, and happy to share my knowledge along the way.
About.title: About Me

Contact.text: If you want to contact me or have any questions, feel free to send me a message. I'm here to help you and listen to your idea
Contact.title: Contact

Metadata.page-description: Front End Web Developer with experience in JavaScript, CSS, React and Next.js. Discover my open source web projects and solutions.

Projects.text: Throughout my experience as a web developer, I have done several projects that reflect my skill and passion for web development. I invite you to explore my project gallery to learn more about my work.
Projects.title: Projects
